fixes.name: Carry mod
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustomDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustomDate,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        SWITCH(
            TRUE(),
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/Rr (group)] = "Repo", ABS('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Carry (in CAD)]) * -1,
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/Rr (group)] = "Reverse Repo", ABS('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Carry (in CAD)]),
            0
        ),
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = EndDateParam,
        SWITCH(
            TRUE(),
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/Rr (group)] = "Repo", ABS('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Carry (in CAD)]) * -1,
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/Rr (group)] = "Reverse Repo", ABS('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Carry (in CAD)]),
            0
        ),
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF/ELSEIF logic to DAX IF and SWITCH. Mapped parameter references to SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]). Preserved ABS() and multiplied by -1 for "Repo". All column and calculated field references were converted to the table-qualified form 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName].
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
